codex_entry.name: Emotional Gravity Node
codex_entry.purpose: Model the gravitational pull between emotional signals as fields in Obviology. Emotional Gravity determines attraction, repulsion, and acceleration between two or more emotional states.

outputs.force: The pull or push between emotional nodes
outputs.direction: Vector pointing toward/away from other emotional nodes
outputs.wellDepth: Curvature depth representing stability or volatility
outputs.acceleration: Rate of movement toward/away from emotional alignment

mathematics.gravity_formula: F = G_e * (I1 * I2 * C1 * C2) / distance^2

constants.emotional_mass: Derived from pattern stability and memory
